channel.title: Devo 2.7 dialogues

item.title: Devo 2.7 dialogues
item.dc:creator: @0mg_Noob 0mg Noob
item.description:
@0mg_Noob wrote:

OK well I can’t sus how to get more than 2 dialogues linked lol, sounds stupid I know, but I’ll tell you what I mean.

Example:

case 10000: playertalking(c, "Hello Romeo! What are you up to?", "I'm so bored, I'm asking for help on mopar!", "Maybe someone might show me how to do more", "than two dialogues per npc eh?"); case 10001: npctalking(c, 1010, "", "Yes I do hope so, 0mg Noob!", "Do let me know if they help!", "Cya!"); case 10002: npctalking(c, 1010, "", "Blahblah", "Blahblah", "Cya!"); break;

OK that was an example, I then add:

|| c.NpcDialogue == 10000

and the the wannetalk bit in client, and I click the npc in game and only two of the dialogues show? then it closes… How do I get more than 2 lol.

Read full topic
